name: 民国风美女
description: 一位民国风美女，175cm，完美腰身比，长腿细腰，极美精致的脸庞，杏仁眼，复古优雅气质，单盘发有刘海，发尾自然下垂，直角肩，眼神清澈无辜，全身像

face.lip_shape: classic bow with defined cupid's bow
face.expression: clear innocent doe-like eyes, pure and guileless gaze
face.overall_impression: exquisite refined republic era beauty, porcelain doll-like features, innocent and pure temperament

skin.micro_details: fine translucent quality, barely visible pores

hair.hair_style: single side bun with bangs, loose strands framing face, ends draping naturally beside cheeks
hair.hair_accessories: pearl pins or vintage jade hairpin optional
hair.face_framing: loose tendrils naturally falling beside face

clothing.style: republic era qipao or vintage dress

top.type: fitted qipao bodice or high collar blouse
top.material: silk or brocade with subtle patterns
top.coverage: high collar, cap sleeves or long sleeves
top.details: mandarin collar, frog buttons, side slits

bottom.type: matching qipao skirt or wide leg trousers
bottom.fit: fitted through hips flowing to hem

default_pose.hand_position: one hand at waist or holding vintage clutch
default_pose.framing: full body shot, complete figure from head to toe
default_pose.camera_angle: slightly low angle to emphasize height

rendering.lighting_model: soft diffused lighting with warm undertones
rendering.anti_anime: NO anime style, NO cartoon, NO illustration
rendering.realism_enhancers: subsurface scattering, realistic skin translucency, fabric texture detail
rendering.color_grading: warm sepia undertones, muted palette, vintage film look
